The original Death Note tells the story of a Japanese high school student named Light Yagami who one day stumbles upon a ‚ÄúDeath Note,‚Äù a notebook that kills anyone whose name is written in it. Soon the mass murders draw the attention of an eccentric detective named L, who‚Äôs keen on hunting down the person responsible.
